ps2.7:1.2: iti hidam ayasmato kondannassa “annasikondanno” tveva namam ahosi.
ps2.7:2.1: “Idam dukkham ariyasaccan”ti pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapadi, nanam udapadi, panna udapadi, vijja udapadi, aloko udapadi.
ps2.7:4.6: Ime panca dhamma panca attha dukkhavatthuka saccavatthuka saccarammana saccagocara saccasangahita saccapariyapanna sacce samudagata sacce thita sacce patitthita.
ps2.7:5.23: Tam kho pana dhammacakkam appativattiyam samanena va brahmanena va devena va marena va brahmuna va kenaci va lokasminti—dhammacakkam.
ps2.7:7.1: Adhipateyyatthena indriyam dhammo tam dhammam pavattetiti—dhammacakkam.
ps2.7:7.2: Akampiyatthena balam dhammo tam dhammam pavattetiti—dhammacakkam.
ps2.7:7.3: Niyyanikatthena bojjhango dhammo tam dhammam pavattetiti—dhammacakkam.
ps2.7:7.4: Hetutthena maggo dhammo tam dhammam pavattetiti—dhammacakkam.
ps2.7:7.5: Upatthanatthena satipatthana dhammo tam dhammam pavattetiti—dhammacakkam.
ps2.7:7.6: Padahanatthena sammappadhana dhammo tam dhammam pavattetiti—dhammacakkam.
ps2.7:7.7: Ijjhanatthena iddhipada dhammo tam dhammam pavattetiti—dhammacakkam.
ps2.7:7.8: Tathatthena sacca dhammo tam dhammam pavattetiti—dhammacakkam.
ps2.7:7.9: Avikkhepatthena samatho dhammo tam dhammam pavattetiti—dhammacakkam.
ps2.7:7.10: Anupassanatthena vipassana dhammo tam dhammam pavattetiti—dhammacakkam.
ps2.7:7.11: Ekarasatthena samathavipassana dhammo tam dhammam pavattetiti—dhammacakkam.
ps2.7:7.12: Anativattanatthena yuganaddham dhammo tam dhammam pavattetiti—dhammacakkam.
ps2.7:7.13: Samvaratthena silavisuddhi dhammo tam dhammam pavattetiti—dhammacakkam.
ps2.7:7.14: Avikkhepatthena cittavisuddhi dhammo tam dhammam pavattetiti—dhammacakkam.
ps2.7:7.15: Dassanatthena ditthivisuddhi dhammo tam dhammam pavattetiti—dhammacakkam.
ps2.7:7.16: Muttatthena vimokkho dhammo tam dhammam pavattetiti—dhammacakkam.
ps2.7:7.17: Pativedhatthena vijja dhammo tam dhammam pavattetiti—dhammacakkam.
ps2.7:7.18: Pariccagatthena vimutti dhammo tam dhammam pavattetiti—dhammacakkam.
ps2.7:7.19: Samucchedatthena khaye nanam dhammo tam dhammam pavattetiti—dhammacakkam.
ps2.7:7.20: Patippassaddhatthena anuppade nanam dhammo tam dhammam pavattetiti—dhammacakkam.
ps2.7:7.21: Chando mulatthena dhammo tam dhammam pavattetiti—dhammacakkam.
ps2.7:7.22: Manasikaro samutthanatthena dhammo tam dhammam pavattetiti—dhammacakkam.
ps2.7:7.23: Phasso samodhanatthena dhammo tam dhammam pavattetiti—dhammacakkam.
ps2.7:7.24: Vedana samosaranatthena dhammo tam dhammam pavattetiti—dhammacakkam.
ps2.7:7.25: Samadhi pamukhatthena dhammo tam dhammam pavattetiti—dhammacakkam.
ps2.7:7.26: Sati adhipateyyatthena dhammo tam dhammam pavattetiti—dhammacakkam.
ps2.7:7.27: Panna taduttaratthena dhammo tam dhammam pavattetiti—dhammacakkam.
ps2.7:7.28: Vimutti saratthena dhammo tam dhammam pavattetiti—dhammacakkam.
ps2.7:7.29: Amatogadham nibbanam pariyosanatthena dhammo tam dhammam pavattetiti—dhammacakkam.
ps2.7:8.2: parinnatanti pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapadi …pe…
ps2.7:9.11: Ime panca dhamma panca attha dukkhavatthuka saccavatthuka saccarammana saccagocara saccasangahita saccapariyapanna sacce samudagata sacce thita sacce patitthita.
ps2.7:10.8: amatogadham nibbanam pariyosanatthena dhammo tam dhammam pavattetiti—dhammacakkam.
ps2.7:11.1: “Idam dukkhasamudayam ariyasaccan”ti pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapadi …pe…
ps2.7:13.3: Ime panca dhamma panca attha samudayavatthuka saccavatthuka …pe…
ps2.7:13.5: maggavatthuka saccavatthuka saccarammana saccagocara saccasangahita saccapariyapanna sacce samudagata sacce thita sacce patitthita.
ps2.7:14.8: amatogadham nibbanam pariyosanatthena dhammo tam dhammam pavattetiti—dhammacakkam.
ps2.7:15.1: “‘Ayam kaye kayanupassana’ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapadi …pe…
ps2.7:15.3: Sa kho panayam kaye kayanupassana bhavetabbati me, bhikkhave …pe…
ps2.7:15.4: bhavitati me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapadi …pe…
ps2.7:16.3: ayam dhammesu dhammanupassanati me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapadi …pe…
ps2.7:16.5: Sa kho panayam dhammesu dhammanupassana bhavetabbati me, bhikkhave …pe…
ps2.7:16.6: bhavitati me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapadi …pe…
ps2.7:17.1: “Ayam kaye kayanupassana”ti pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapadi …pe…
ps2.7:17.3: sa kho panayam kaye kayanupassana bhavetabbati …pe…
ps2.7:17.4: bhavitati pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapadi …pe…
ps2.7:19.3: Ime panca dhamma panca attha kayavatthuka satipatthanavatthuka …pe…
ps2.7:19.6: dhammavatthuka satipatthanavatthuka satipatthanarammana satipatthanagocara satipatthanasangahita satipatthanapariyapanna satipatthane samudagata satipatthane thita satipatthane patitthita.
ps2.7:20.8: amatogadham nibbanam pariyosanatthena dhammo tam dhammam pavattetiti—dhammacakkam.
ps2.7:21.1: “‘Ayam chandasamadhipadhanasankharasamannagato iddhipado’ti me, bhikkhave pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapadi …pe…
ps2.7:21.3: ‘So kho panayam chandasamadhipadhanasankharasamannagato iddhipado bhavetabbo’ti me, bhikkhave …pe…
ps2.7:21.4: bhavitoti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapadi …pe…
ps2.7:22.3: ayam vimamsasamadhipadhanasankharasamannagato iddhipadoti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapadi …pe…
ps2.7:22.5: So kho panayam vimamsasamadhipadhanasankharasamannagato iddhipado bhavetabboti me, bhikkhave …pe…
ps2.7:22.6: bhavitoti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapadi …pe…
ps2.7:23.1: “Ayam chandasamadhipadhanasankharasamannagato iddhipado”ti pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapadi …pe…
ps2.7:23.3: so kho panayam chandasamadhipadhanasankharasamannagato iddhipado bhavetabboti …pe…
ps2.7:23.4: bhavitoti pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapadi, nanam udapadi, panna udapadi, vijja udapadi, aloko udapadi.
ps2.7:25.6: Ime panca dhamma panca attha chandavatthuka iddhipadavatthuka iddhipadarammana iddhipadagocara iddhipadasangahita iddhipadapariyapanna iddhipade samudagata iddhipade thita iddhipade patitthita.
ps2.7:26.17: Tam kho pana dhammacakkam appativattiyam samanena va brahmanena va devena va marena va brahmuna va kenaci va lokasminti—dhammacakkam.
ps2.7:28.1: Ayam viriyasamadhipadhanasankharasamannagato iddhipadoti pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapadi …pe…
ps2.7:28.3: so kho panayam viriyasamadhipadhanasankharasamannagato iddhipado bhavetabboti …pe…
ps2.7:28.4: bhavitoti pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapadi …pe…
ps2.7:30.3: Ime panca dhamma panca attha viriyavatthuka iddhipadavatthuka …pe…
ps2.7:30.5: vimamsavatthuka iddhipadavatthuka iddhipadarammana iddhipadagocara iddhipadasangahita iddhipadapariyapanna iddhipade samudagata iddhipade thita iddhipade patitthita.
